subject: New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: New York Road Runners, the club that organizes the New York City Marathon, is asking its members to volunteer if they want to compete. About 7,000 club members gained entry to this year’s marathon, which will be run Nov. 2, by competing in at least 9 of 41 races of various lengths in 2007. To qualify for the 2009 marathon, members will also be required to volunteer for one of the 50 events the Road Runners organize this year.
